snippet.title: Umbratica Tactics Teaser
snippet.description:
Play the Demo: https://theatomiclife.itch.io/umbratica-tactics
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2355130/Umbratica_Tactics/
Suscribe to our Newsletter: https://www.theatomiclife.com/mailinglist
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/7W6HsNKD

Lead a squad of vampire slayers, craft a powerful deck and combine the effects of ancient relics in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Fight your way through the hordes of the undead and the unholy as you attempt to purge the evil that has taken over the once glorious land of Umbratica.
